text:
Santiago, Chile (Santiago of Chile or Santiago de Chile) is the capital of Chile and the largest city in the country. It has the 35.9% (about 7 million people) of the total population. In Chile, people call the city Gran Santiago (Big Santiago) or Santiago only. It has 26 "comunas" (municipalities).
With its geographical conditions because it is located in a valley surrounded by the Andes mountains, Santiago has air pollution.
